title: 44pt / px screen font
content:
Just thought Id post this for people to see. Its a display pixel font optimised for use at 44 pixel / points. I may also do a smooth version for use at larger sizes.   
   
 [http://www.selfbuildtype.com/grip.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414213856/http:/www.selfbuildtype.com/grip.gif)
author: selfbuildtype

comments.content:
Oh and heres a test run:   
   
 [http://www.selfbuildtype.com/theorytest.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414213856/http:/www.selfbuildtype.com/theorytest.jpg)
A bit of both: Im quite happy with it and it will be for sale at some point, but I would like to hear peoples thoughts and comments. I suppose it isnt really a work in progress...

Craig, are you posting these for a critique or   
are you showing us something that's finished   
or for sale?   
   
Very nice, btw.

I love how this is purely designed for screen.   
Unlike some other large display types, this   
doesn't feel gimmicky or forced at all.   
   
I love the texture you've achieved (especially in   
your "theorytest" example).
